headerDisplay:
Homebridge plugin for Electra Smart A/C
To retrieve credentials (`imei` && `token`), you must run `electra-extract` command in terminal

imei.title: IMEI
imei.description: This value can be obtain via terminal command: `electra-extract`

token.title: Token
token.description: This value can be obtain via terminal command: `electra-extract`

disableFan.title: Disable Fan Accessory
disableFan.description: Disable FAN mode control - remove extra fan accessory

disableDry.title: Disable Dry Accessory
disableDry.description: Disable DRY mode control - remove extra dehumidifier accessory

statePollingInterval.title: AC Device Status Polling Interval in Seconds
statePollingInterval.description: Time in seconds between each status polling of the Electra devices (set to 0 for no polling)

debug.title: Enable Debug Logs
debug.description: When checked, the plugin will produce extra logs for debugging purposes
